tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: #FSI recognizes the career and service of former Secretary of State George P. Shultz. As Secretary of State, Shultz utilize…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: #FSI recognizes the career and service of former Secretary of State George P. Shultz. As Secretary of State, Shultz utilized the tools of diplomacy to improve our relations with the Soviet Union. To learn more visit @HistoryAtState #FRUS: bit.ly/3jtGGJZ #FSIremembers
